Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at 63rd. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at 63rd.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #43 43rd Temporary Westbound Reroute near 43rd/Vincennes
ShortDescription: Westbound 43 43rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 43rd, St. Lawrence, 42nd St., King Dr., and 43rd due to, street blockage near 43rd/Vincennes.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #43 43rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 43rd, St. Lawrence, 42nd St., King Dr., and 43rd due to, street blockage near 43rd/Vincennes.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
